Summary: Light with no strobe moving SW with a slite zig zag to it.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe light was bright in the sky. moving not fast and side to side going south east. The light became brighter for 2 sec then faded out. I thought it was a meteor, but i didnt see any trail or tail like others i seen. It lasted 15 sec. Looking for more i saw another one going south. Same thing a steady light no strobe. Became brighter then fade to nothing. I live 6miles from Luke AFB and know the flight path of sky harbor. These were not planes. There is a bright half moon. The sky was lit up good. not many stars were seen. I dont think it was a satelight. Wonder it there any meteor showers going on?
